name: GraGone
description:
Your nation is in danger, the enemy can’t be stopped… unless you find your long lost allies! Set off on a great adventure and find your way through clouds, dungeons and volcanoes. Prove you are worthy of GraGons' help!

Made by:

Merloj - programming

SpartaqS - programming

хехехеликс - graphics

Gacper - level design, audio
